system-prompt.purpose: Generate a suitable file name based on the following content: {{trimmed_content[:100]}}...

instructions.instruction: Create a short, descriptive file name based on the content.
Use lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only.
Include an appropriate file extension (e.g., .txt, .md, .py) based on the content type.
Limit the file name to 50 characters maximum, including the extension.
